languages.text: Этот персонаж изувечен. Весь получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличен на +50%, наносимый урон уменьшен на 50%,а персонаж становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для Злобы.

This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.
languages.original_text: Этот персонаж изувечен. Весь получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличен на +50%, наносимый урон уменьшен на 50%,а персонаж становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для Злобы.

traits.locale_text: This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All damage dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

languages.text: このキャラクターには{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}障害がある{/g}。相手に与える全ての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+50%され、相手から受ける全てのダメージが−50%され、そのキャラクターがは悪意の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターには{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}障害{/g}がある。相手に与える全てのダメージが50％増加し、相手から受ける全てのダメージが50％軽減し、そのキャラクターがマリスの{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。

languages.text: 此角色处于{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}致残{/g}状态。此角色造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%，承受的所有伤害提高50%，且此角色成为恶棍的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。
languages.original_text: This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

traits.locale_text: 此角色处于{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}致残{/g}状态。此角色造成的所有伤害降低50%，承受的所有伤害提高50%，且此角色成为恶棍的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。

languages.text: Este personaje está {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}lisiado{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que recibe aumenta un +50 %, el que inflige se reduce un −50 % y el personaje pasa a ser {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de Malicia.
languages.original_text: This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

traits.locale_text: Este personaje está {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}lisiado{/g}. El daño que recibe aumenta un +50 %, el que inflige se reduce un −50 % y el personaje pasa a ser {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de Malicia.

languages.text: Dieser Charakter ist {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}verkrüppelt{/g}. Erlittener Schaden wird um +50 % erhöht, verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird um −50 % verringert. Ferner wird der Charakter ein {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} von Tücke.
languages.original_text: This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Charakter ist {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}verkrüppelt{/g}. Jeglicher ihm zugefügter Schaden wird um +50 % erhöht, jeglicher von ihm verursachter Schaden wird um -50 % verringert und der Charakter wird ein {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} von Bosheit.

languages.text: Ce personnage est {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}estropié{/g}. Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qui lui sont infligés augmentent de 50 %, tous les dégâts qu'il inflige diminuent de 50 % et il devient une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour Malice.
languages.original_text: This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.

traits.locale_text: Ce personnage est {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}estropié{/g}. Tous les dégâts qui lui sont infligés augmentent de +50 %, tous les dégâts qu'il inflige diminuent de -50 % et il devient une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour Démon.

languages.text: Bu karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}kötürüm{/g} oldu. Ona verilen her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} %50 artarken verdiği her türlü hasar ise %50 azalır. Ayrıca karakter, Melanet'in {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefi{/g} hâline gelir.
languages.original_text: This character is {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}crippled{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to them is increased by +50%, all damage dealt by them is reduced by −50%, and the character becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for Malice.
